lines.text: I'm sort of a stranger here myself.
He's just using me for bait. You're the fish he's after.
I'm sure I could learn to like you, if you were roasted.
This is Grandma Scott. She knitted the Dred Scott decision on a piece of old burlap.
You're a very important woman in the business world. I hope to be important, too, someday. My career is very important to me.
Don't let a career ruin you. It's something that sponges up your whole life and leaves you empty.
